languages.text: Второй отряд понес серьезные потери, когда на разведчиков обрушилась масса кабелей, находящихся под напряжением. Люди отступили, не сумев ни вынести тела товарищей, ни добыть сколь-либо ценной добычи. Докладывающий о ситуации капитан Вести не произнес ни одной шутки, что для него было в высшей степени нетипично.

traits.locale_text: Второй отряд понес серьезные потери, когда на скаутов обрушилась масса кабелей, находящихся под напряжением. Скауты отступили, не сумев ни вынести тела товарищей, ни добыть сколь-либо ценной добычи. Докладывающий о ситуации капитан Вести не произнес ни одной шутки, что для него было в высшей степени нетипично.

languages.text: The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.
languages.original_text: Второй отряд понес серьезные потери, когда на разведчиков обрушилась масса кабелей, находящихся под напряжением. Люди отступили, не сумев ни вынести тела товарищей, ни добыть сколь-либо ценной добычи. Докладывающий о ситуации капитан Вести не произнес ни одной шутки, что для него было в высшей степени нетипично.

traits.locale_text: The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

languages.text: La segunda unidad había sufrido numerosas bajas al caerle encima un gran fardo de cables electrizados. El grupo se había visto obligado a retirarse sin poder recuperar los cadáveres de sus camaradas ni nada de valor de la nave. Durante su informe, el capitán Vesti no hizo ninguna broma, algo nada común en él.
languages.original_text: The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

traits.locale_text: La segunda unidad había sufrido numerosas bajas al caerle encima un gran fardo de cables electrizados. El grupo se había visto obligado a retirarse sin poder recuperar los cadáveres de sus camaradas ni nada de valor de la nave. Durante su informe, el capitán Vesti no hizo ninguna broma, algo nada común en él.

languages.text: 第二只小队遭受了惨重的损失，因为一大捆带电的电缆砸在了队员的身上。小队只得撤退，无法从飞船上获得任何有价值的资源，阵亡队员的遗体也被留在了飞船上。在报告情况的时候，维斯提上尉连一句玩笑都没有开，这很不像他的风格。
languages.original_text: The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

traits.locale_text: 第二只小队遭受了惨重的损失，因为一大捆带电的电缆砸在了队员的身上。小队只得撤退，无法从飞船上获得任何有价值的资源，阵亡队员的遗体也被留在了飞船上。在报告情况的时候，维斯提上尉连一句玩笑都没有开，这很不像他的风格。

languages.text: 2番目の部隊は、大きな通電ケーブルの束が頭上に落ちてきたことにより重い損害を被った。一行は船から仲間の遺体や貴重な物資を回収することができずに撤退した。状況を報告する際、ヴェスティ中隊長はジョークをひとつも飛ばすこともなく、中隊長らしさはゼロだった。
languages.original_text: The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

traits.locale_text: 2番目の部隊は、大きな通電ケーブルの束が頭上に落ちてきたことにより重い損害を被った。一行は船から仲間の遺体や貴重な物資を回収することができずに撤退した。状況を報告する際、ヴェスティ中隊長はジョークをひとつも飛ばすこともなく、中隊長らしさはゼロだった。

languages.text: Die zweite Einheit hatte massive Verluste erlitten, als ein großes Bündel von Stromkabeln auf sie herabgestürzt war. Die Gruppe hatte sich zurückgezogen und konnte weder die Leichen ihrer Kameraden bergen noch irgendetwas von Wert aus dem Schiff sicherstellen. Bei seiner Meldung machte Captain Vesti keinen einzigen Witz, was sehr untypisch für ihn war.
languages.original_text: The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

traits.locale_text: Die zweite Einheit hatte massive Verluste erlitten, als ein großes Bündel von Stromkabeln auf sie herabgestürzt war. Die Gruppe hatte sich zurückgezogen und konnte weder die Leichen ihrer Kameraden bergen noch irgendetwas von Wert aus dem Schiff sicherstellen. Bei seiner Meldung machte Captain Vesti keinen einzigen Witz, was sehr untypisch für ihn war.

languages.text: La deuxième unité avait subi de lourdes pertes lorsqu'un énorme faisceau de câbles électrifiés lui était tombé dessus. Les éclaireurs avaient été contraints de battre en retraite sans pouvoir ramener les corps de leurs camarades ni mettre la main sur du matériel utile. Contrairement à son habitude, le capitaine Vesti n'essaya pas une seule fois de plaisanter en faisant son rapport.
languages.original_text: The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

traits.locale_text: La deuxième unité avait subi de lourdes pertes lorsqu'un énorme faisceau de câbles électrifiés lui était tombé dessus. Les éclaireurs avaient été contraints de battre en retraite sans pouvoir ramener les corps de leurs camarades ni mettre la main sur du matériel utile. Contrairement à son habitude, le capitaine Vesti n'essaya pas une seule fois de plaisanter en faisant son rapport.

languages.text: İkinci birim, hasarlı kablolardan oluşan devasa bir yığın üstlerine düştüğünde çok sayıda kayıp vermişti. Grup geri çekilmiş ancak düşen yoldaşlarının naaşlarını geri alamamış ya da değerli bir ganimet ele geçirmeyi başaramamıştı. Durum raporu veren Yüzbaşı Vesti, tek bir espri yapmamıştı. Bu bile durumun ciddiyetini anlatmaya yeterdi.
languages.original_text: The second unit had suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables had fallen on top of them. The group had retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship. When reporting on the situation, Captain Vesti didn't crack a single joke, which was very out of character.

traits.locale_text: İkinci birim, hasarlı kablolardan oluşan devasa bir yığın üstlerine düştüğünde çok sayıda kayıp vermişti. Grup geri çekilmiş ancak düşen yoldaşlarının naaşlarını geri alamamış ya da değerli herhangi bir ganimet ele geçirmeyi başaramamıştı. Durum raporu veren Yüzbaşı Vesti, tek bir espri yapmamıştı. Durumun ciddiyeti buradan bile anlaşılıyordu.
